amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit to $48.6 million the appropriation for development assistance to India.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of May 30, 1996 to limit funding for Development Assistance to India to $48,674,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 296 (Roll no. 218).
